member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.StripHotkeyFromTarget(Microsoft.Localization.LocSourceString)
member.summary: Uses LocStudio logic to remove the hotkey from the target string.
member.param: LocString to remove hotkey from. Safe to pass null as input.
member.returns: String without the hotkey. Empty string returned on null input.
member.remarks: If the string is not translated (in LocStudio you see target=source), this method attempts to parse source string to remove hotkeys and return this source string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.StripHotkey(Microsoft.Localization.LocSourceString)
member.summary: Uses LocStudio logic to remove the hotkey from the source string.
member.param: LocString to remove hotkey from. Safe to pass null as input.
member.returns: String without the hotkey. Empty string returned on null input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetHotkey(Microsoft.Localization.LocSourceString,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets hotkey from source string.
member.param: If true, target string is processed instead of source string.
member.returns: 0 if there is no hotkey or string is null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetLocStatus(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Get LocStatus from LocItem. Implements correct logic for string==null situations.
member.param: LocItem to obtain the value from.
member.returns: Returns LocStatus.NotApplicable if LocItem has no string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetApprovalStatus(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Gets ApprovalStatus from LocItem.
member.returns: Returns ApprovalStatus.NotApplicable if LocItem has no string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetTransOrigin(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Get TransOrigin from LocItem. Implements correct logic for string==null situations.
member.param: LocItem to obtain the value from.
member.returns: Returns TransOrigin.NotApplicable if LocItem has no string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetAutoCommentInfo(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Attempts to return comments from TranslationPlatform for the specified LocItem. If TransPlatform is not available (COM component registration failure or some libraries from TransPlatform missing) then CommentInfo.Empty is returned. The name of the comment is also empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.ConvertInstructionsToStringList(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Converts the Comments collection from a LocItem into a List of strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.CountWords(System.String)
member.summary: Temporary method for counting words. Consider replacing with a Word wourdcounter or something closer to LocStudio logic.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetLocationPath(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Obtains path to the location of the LocItem with the displayable structure in LocStudio. Unfortunately this is not equal to the structure of an LCX file, for example OSTRMan strings belong to one huge table (Office String Table) in the LCX structure, but in LocStudio they are devided into smaller tables. As far as I am able to tell if LocItem.Display.DisplayPath is not null that means that the display location is somewhat different than the LCX structure location. The method tries to identify which is the case and return some meaningful path. At the moment it is assumed that these paths will be used to compare objects if the belong to the same location so it does not really matter what we return as long as it is consistent.
member.returns: Path to the location of the item within the LocStudio displayable structure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.GetLocationSeq(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Item's sequence within its LocStudio displayable location. As in the case of the location (above) this varies: in case of OSTRman like tables each item has an Order value that defines the sequence. In case of items belonging to a structure that matches the LCX structure we will have to count the relative position as it is not explicitly available. Again the value is meant to be used for comparison between to LocItems belonging to the same displayable location in LocStudio.
member.returns: Sequence of the LocItem within the LocStudio displayable structure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.LRIsLocalizedOrUpdated(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource)
member.summary: Method to be used as filter with LocResource.NeighboursWithFilter. Using this common method enables proper caching.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.ContainsUnprotected_old(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[])
member.summary: Checks if given string s is matched by one of the regular expressions in regexes. If so, checks if the matching part is referenced by at least one LocVer rule assigned to the lr object.
member.param: LocResource object to test against.
String to match regular expressions against.
List of regular expressions to match against s.
member.returns: True if at least one regular expression matches s and the matching value is referenced by at least one LocVer rule contained in lr.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.ContainsUnprotected(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[])
member.summary: Checks if given string s is matched by one of the regular expressions in regexes. If so, checks if the matching part is referenced by at least one LocVer rule assigned to the lr object.
member.param: LocResource object to test against.
String to match regular expressions against.
List of regular expressions to match against s.
member.returns: A collection of regular expression matches where the matching value is referenced by at least one LocVer rule contained in lr.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Misc.LocResourceHelpers.HasMatchingLocVer(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if any of the LocVers assigned to the LocResource references the token as one of its parameters. For example give a token "test" if there is a locver {Placeholder="test"} method will return true; Method checks against two LocResource properties: Comments and AutoComment sinc they both can contain locver. If you want to target AutoComment specifically use "AutoComment" in the cmtsList parameter.
member.param: LocResource object to test against.
A string to be referenced by a LocVer.
Optional list of Comment nodes to be searched. All nodes are searched if null is passed. Use "AutoComment" if you want to refer to AutoCommenting LocVer specifically.
member.returns: True if at least one LocVer references token.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource
member.summary: LocResource is an abstraction of a Localizable Resource.

member.summary: Checks if Source String is matched by one of the regular expressions in regexes. If so, checks if the matching part is referenced by at least one LocVer rule assigned to the LocResource object.
member.param: List of regular expressions to match against Source String.
member.returns: True if at least one regular expression matches source string and the matching value is referenced by at least one LocVer rule contained in the LocResource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.SourceContainsUnprotected(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex[])
member.summary: Checks if Source String is matched by one of the regular expressions in regexes. If so, checks if the matching part is referenced by at least one LocVer rule assigned to the LocResource object.
member.param: List of regular expressions to match against Source String.
member.returns: A collection of regular expression matches on source string where the matching value is referenced by at least one LocVer rule contained in the LocResource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.GetDimensionIntersection(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.Properties.Property[])
member.summary: Gets an intersection of multiple dimensions at coordinates specified by properties listed in params. For examlpe, to get all LocResource objects that belong to the same table as the current resource and that are Updated, call: this.GetIntersection(this.LocationPath, new SimpleProperty<LocStatus>("LocalizationStatus", LocStatus.Updated)) CACHING: Method uses result caching.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FindSimilar(System.String[])
member.summary: Find objects in space that are similar to the current object. Similar means that the properties listed in parameter must be the same. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: List of properties that must match
member.returns: A list of objects that are similar. Empty list if none.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FindSimilar(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.Properties.Property[])
member.summary: Finds objects in space that are similar to the current object. Similar means that the properties, whose names are given by parameter must be the same. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: List of properties that must match
member.returns: A list of objects that are similar. Empty list if none.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FindDifferent(System.String[])
member.summary: Opposite to FindSimilar(). Different means an object that has the listed properties different than the current object. The rest of the properties must be the same CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: List of properties that must differ.
member.returns: A list of different objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FindDifferent(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.Properties.Property[])
member.summary: Opposite to FindSimilar(). Different means an object that has the listed properties different than the current object. The rest of the properties must be the same CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: List of properties that must differ
member.returns: A list of different objects.

member.summary: Gets objects present in x+1 point of the dimension, where x is the value of the dimension property for this object.
member.param: Name of the dimension

member.summary: Gets objects present in x+number point of the dimension, where x is the value of the dimension property for this object.
member.param: Name of the dimension

member.summary: Gets objects present in x-1 point of the dimension, where x is the value of the dimension property for this object.
member.param: Name of the dimension

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Previous(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets objects present in x-number point of the dimension, where x is the value of the dimension property for this object.
member.param: Name of the dimension

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Range(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets objects present in the range of points (x+/-number) of the dimension, where x is the value of the dimension property for this object. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: Name of the dimension

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Neighbours
member.summary: Obtains all LocResource objects that appear in the same LocStudio table as the current object. Only the objects from the same Build and LocDocument are returned. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.returns: LocResource objects from the same LocStudio table, minus the current object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Neighbours(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns LocResource objects that appear before and after this object in the same LocStudio table. The purpose is to simulate what the user sees in LocStudio as the location of a string within the context of other strings often is very important. Important: only objects with the same BuildNumber property value are considered. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: Number of objects (strings) before this object.
Number of objects after this object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.NeighboursWithFilter(System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.COExpression{Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource})
member.summary: Returns LocResource objects that appear before and after this object in the same LocStudio table. The purpose is to simulate what the user sees in LocStudio as the location of a string within the context of other strings often is very important. Objects not matching the filter are ignored and not included in the before/after count. PERFORMANCE: Using this as compared to Neighbours() has a significant performance penalty. CACHING: Method uses result caching.
member.param: Number of objects (strings) before this object.
Number of objects after this object.
Only the objects matching the filter will be considered

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.RegisterTypeForEngineCleanup(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.OSLEBotEngine)
member.summary: Registers any LocResource specific cleanup methods with the EngineCleanup event

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LocResourceCleanup(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Engine raises this event when it has finished a session run. In reaction, we reinitialize Space.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Locgroup
member.summary: Name of the Locgroup to which the LCX file belongs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LSResID
member.summary: Full LocStudio Resource ID path is returned via .Value. You can also use ItemId and ItemType to drill down deeper - this is based on LCX OM.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.UniqueResID
member.summary: Represents a unique path to the resource, built from the following elements: ProjectName, LocGroup, LcxFileName, LSResID. The purpose of this is to uniquely identify a resource within the project structure; LocStudio resource ID does not guarantee this.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FriendlyID
member.summary: A friendly string ID of a resource, i.e. a resource handle used to load a resource. Most resources (i.e. ResT) have unique, meaningful handle names that are used in code to reference resource. These tend to get lost in the full LSResID. The value of this property is equivalent to LSResID.ItemID.StringID and can be empty for some resources

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LocalizationStatus
member.summary: Returns LocStatus of the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.ApprovalStatus
member.summary: Returns ApprovalStatus for the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.TranslationOrigin
member.summary: Returns TransOrigin property of the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.UserSrcLocked
member.summary: Returns UserSrcLocked flag (true or false) of the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.UserTransLocked
member.summary: Returns UserTransLocked flag (true or false) of the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.DevLocked
member.summary: Returns DevLocked flag (true or false) of the specified LocResource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Comments
member.summary: A complex property consisting of parsed contenet of the Instructions field. Comments are devided into sections based on the division in Instructions entry, i.e.: "Dev", "Loc", etc. Use .AllComments to access everything or use dictionary access (i.e. Comments["Dev"]) to access only part of the Instruction field. This property DOES NOT contain AutoCommenting. Use AutoComments property to query for that.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.AutoComment
member.summary: Returns AutoComment property contianing comments generated automatically by TransPlatform engine. Note: this may be null or throw exceptions when LocResource module is not able to locate and load all libraries necessary to access TransPlatform engine (which is part of LocStudio 6.1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Document
member.summary: Returns a reference to LocDocument from which the specified LocResource originates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.FileName
member.summary: The name of the source file to which the object belongs

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LcxFileName
member.summary: The name of the Lcx file from which the resource has been loaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LocationPath
member.summary: Location in the LocStudio display tree. Varies depending on table type, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.LocationSequence
member.summary: Order number within the Location Path. Varies depending on table type, etc. This should be used to establish the location with the same table only.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.Modified
member.summary: Modified information from LCX OM.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.DisplayIcon
member.summary: The Icon Type that is used to display the item in LocStudio. This gives a hint as to what type of resource we are dealing with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.ParentDisplayIcon
member.summary: The Icon Type that is used to display the parent of this item in LocStudio. This can be used to check to what type of a control the item belongs to (i.e. Dialog, Menu, etc.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.HasBinaryData
member.summary: LocResource contains binary data (such as dialog control coordinates, icons, bitmaps, etc.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.SourceCulture
member.summary: SourceCulture object for this resource. This uses the Microsoft.Localization.LocCulture class built on top of System.Globalization.CultureInfo which contains additional properties.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource.TargetCulture
member.summary: TargetCulture object for this resource. This uses the Microsoft.Localization.LocCulture class built on top of System.Globalization.CultureInfo which contains additional properties.

member.summary: Helper class containing convenience methods to work with LCX object model.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.OSLEBotLCXHelper.Reset
member.summary: Resets static fields used internally for caching.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.OSLEBotLCXHelper.LocDocumentToPathMappings
member.summary: Maps instances of loaded LocDocuments to their physical location on disk. Otherwise it is not possible to get this from the LocDocument object and we need it in logically separate components of oslebot, i.e. output writers Uses unique HashCode id generated by System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.GetHashcode() as key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.OSLEBotLCXHelper.GetLcxPath(Microsoft.Localization.LocDocument)
member.summary: Returns full path to the LCX file from which the document was loaded. Throws an exception if the path is not available: LocDocument was not registered when it was loaded.
member.param: LocDocument
member.returns: full path to the Lcx file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.OSLEBotLCXHelper.RegisterLcxPath(Microsoft.Localization.LocDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Internally register the path to the LCX file from which LocDocument is created. Later you will be able to use GetLcxPath to obtain it from another component. Throws an exception if the instance of LocDocument is already registered with a different path.
member.param: LocDocument
Full path to the LCX

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified

The StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter
member.summary: This specialized writer creates multiple XML output files: one file per input LCL file. This writer is to be used only in certain scenarios where it makes more sense to ouput to several separate XML files rather than one file, for example to OSLE "OSLEBotupdate" workflow. This writer should only be used with Classification Objects of type LocResource or any other type that contains the "LocDocument" property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter._outputXmls
member.summary: index of output xmlwriters pointing to different xml files.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter._outputXmlFiles
member.summary: A list of all files created by the output writer. Used in Finalize() to validate against schema.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter.WriterSettings
member.summary: Settings for all xmlwriters

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter.InitializeXmlWriter(System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a header for a newly created output xml file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Output.LocResourcePerLCLOutputWriter.WriteCOToXmlWriter(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Output.OutputEntryForOneWholeCOWithAllRules,System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: Writes a OutputEntryForOneWholeCOWithAllRules using an XmlWriter. This should be used in the future to replace the currentl XmlDocument-based method in XmlOutputWriter.cs
member.param: Output Entry object describing the CO and the results of rules having been applied.
XmlWriter object to which write to.

member.name: T:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper
member.summary: Acts as interface or bridge to a 32 bit .NET assembly containing Translation Platform libraries. This assembly is registered as a COM library and a COM+ application is created for it which hosts the 32 bit assembly. This allows OSLEBot to run as a 64 bit application and use all available memory on 64-bit OS.

member.name: M:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.GetPseudoString(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Pseudo localizes the given LocItem using TransPlatform assosiated with the LocDocument to which it belongs.

member.name: F:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.ms
member.summary: Used with LcxReaderWriter

member.name: F:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.lcxRW
member.summary: Used to serialize LocItems with partial LocDocument

member.name: F:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.partialLds
member.summary: Stores parial LocDocument instances used for serialization of LocItems

member.name: F:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.docItemsField
member.summary: Used to hack a partial LocDocument to modify its list of items

member.name: M:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.WrapIntoLocDocumentAndSerialize(Microsoft.Localization.LocItem)
member.summary: Works around the fact that LCX OM does not expose serialization methods for LocItem. We cannot pass LocItem object to the COM+ application because we are running in 64-bit CLR and it is running in 32

member.name: M:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.Reset
member.summary: Resets any internal cached data, for example cached instances of Translation Platforms created for different settings collections.

member.name: P:TPWorkAround.TPCOMHelper.SAP

member.summary: Initializes static members of class.

member.summary: Represent an empty CommentInfo object.

member.summary: Creates a CommentInfo instance by parsing the Instruction string into the appropriate fields.

Value of the comment as read from LCX LocItem object.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo._locVers
member.summary: List of LocVers extracted from the comment.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo._textComment
member.summary: The entire comment string without the locver calls. For examlpe if the full comment is "Do not remove this placeholder {Placeholder=%s}. Never ever." then TextComment is "Do not remove this placeholder . Never ever.". Allows easy queries against the dev comment while skipping locver entries

member.name: F:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo._fullComment
member.summary: The original comment content.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo.ToString
member.summary: Parses comment into free-flow comment, LocVer calls, etc.
member.param: Content of Instructions field to parse.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo.CommentName
member.summary: Comment name, for example, "Dev"

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo.LocVers
member.summary: Information about LocVer included in the comment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo.TextComment
member.summary: The entire comment string without the locver calls. For examlpe if the full comment is "Do not remove this placeholder {Placeholder=%s}. Never ever." then TextComment is "Do not remove this placeholder . Never ever.". Allows easy queries against the dev comment while skipping locver entries

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.CommentInfo.FullComment
member.summary: The original comment string including both LocVer and TextComment

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of with the specified parameters.

member.summary: Hash code of the string representation (concatenated comments)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Enables to get a comment by its type.
member.param: Type of comment to return, e.g. "Dev"

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.Value
member.summary: Returns a list of all comments. Use dictionary access to drill down, for example: .Comments["Dev"] to access dev comments only

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.AllComments
member.summary: Returns a list of all comments. Use dictionary access to drill down, for example: .Comments["Dev"] to access dev comments only. Same as .Value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.AllLocVers
member.summary: Gets all LocVers from all types of comments. Equivalent of more complex expression involving .Comments.AllComments.SelectMany...

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.AllTextComments
member.summary: Gets all text comments from all types of comments.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of different comments assigned to the resource (i.e. "Dev", "Loc", etc.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocCommentsProperty.HasComments
member.summary: Checks if the Comments collection contains at least one comment and that comment is not empty (contains something else than just spaces)

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocationSequenceProperty
member.summary: LocationSequence is a path to the display location string followed by a number that describes the relative position within the display location, i.e. \ ;Menu \ ;Dummy \ 0 \ 1005 \ 4 \ 0 \ 2728 \ ;WIN_MENU \ 0;5 This requires a separate type (StringProperty was used originally) to obtain correct comparison and sorting. StringComparer does not sort 1,2, 10 as expected in this case

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocationSequenceProperty.LocationSequenceValue
member.summary: Contains location path and sequence number within that path. This simulates the LocStudio display location.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocationSequenceProperty.LocationSequenceValue.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates new instance of with the specified parameters.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocModifiedProperty
member.summary: Need a specialized type to store LCX's LocModified object. Every LocItem has a separate instance of this object and it does not expose an Equals method, so it is not possible to build a reliable dimension on this when using SimpleProperty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocModifiedProperty.GetHashCode
member.returns: HashCode for the DateTime part only.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.LocModifiedProperty.ToString
member.summary: Compares the .DateTime field of .Value (LocModified)

member.name: T:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.Properties.LocResourceProperties.UniqueResID
member.summary: Represents a unique path to the resource, built from the following elements: ProjectName, LocGroup, LcxFileName, LSResID. The purpose of this is to uniquely identify a resource within the project structure; LocStudio resource ID does not guarantee this. Fields of this struct are not accessible - the purpose is to use this as a unique location ID.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.KnowledgeBase.LocResourceRule.Check(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.COExpression{Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource},System.String@)
member.summary: Call this method from within your Run() method. Each call to Check() produces one entry in the log.
member.param: Your rule's logic in form of a lambda expression
Message to be written out to log. Passed as reference so exp can modify the message, if needed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.KnowledgeBase.LocResourceRule.Check(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.COExpression{Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource},System.String)
member.summary: Call this method from within your Run() method. Each call to Check() produces one entry in the log.
member.param: Your rule's logic in form of a lambda expression
Message to be written out to log. Passed as value, so it cannot be modified by exp.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.KnowledgeBase.LocResourceRule.Check(Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.Engine.COExpression{Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.ClassificationObjects.LocResource},Microsoft.Localization.OSLEBot.Core.KnowledgeBase.MessageCreator)
member.summary: Call this method from within your Run() method. Each call to Check() produces one entry in the log. Use your customized message creator in order to build a dynamic message based on the execution of exp.
member.param: Message creator is executed after exp executes. This gives you a chance to modify the content of the message in the exp by passing context information into mc and creating custom logic in your MC implementation of GetMessage().

member.summary: Call this method from within your Run() method. Each call to Check() produces one entry in the log. Use your customized message creator in order to build a dynamic message based on the execution of exp.
member.param: Message creator is executed after exp executes. This gives you a chance to modify the content of the message in the exp by passing context information into mc and creating custom logic in your MC implementation of GetMessage().
Specify the severity of the check.
